name: Dungeout - Ludum Dare #43
description:
This is a stealth game. You are out of resources. Get out of the dungeon without getting caught.
Use arrows to move.
Z - Increase your light.
X - Decrease your light.
C- Turn off your light.

Credits:

Programmer: Thiago Oliveira

Pixel Artist: Leonardo Soares

Sound Designer: Marco Cruz

Free SFX: Julius_Galla

Thanks for playing.
